name: Grace Wang
summary: Senior Data Science Manager at Akamai Technologies with extensive experience in building and leading teams in data science, machine learning, and cybersecurity. Expertise in deploying AI and machine learning models for global threat detection and cybersecurity product differentiation.
work_history: Akamai Technologies: Senior Machine Learning Manager (Feb 2022 - Present) - Built and led teams for data science and cybersecurity, developed AI/ML models for threat detection, and managed large-scale data infrastructure projects. Manager of Machine Learning (Jul 2021 - Mar 2022) - Led data science and security teams focusing on threat analysis and detection. Lead Machine Learning Engineer (Sep 2018 - Jun 2021) - Applied ML to DNS data and cybersecurity. Principal QA Engineer (Nov 2017 - Sep 2018) - Worked on DNS and data streaming engines. Nominum: Sr. Staff Software Test Engineer (Dec 2013 - Nov 2017) - Software testing and QA leadership. Dolby Laboratories: Staff Software Test Engineer (Aug 2011 - Nov 2013) - Led software QA projects, including for Dolby Digital Plus on Amazon Kindle HD devices. 510 Systems: QA Manager (Jan 2010 - Aug 2011), Software QA Engineer (Jul 2009 - Dec 2009). Hewlett Packard: Software QA Lead (May 2006 - Sep 2008). Thales e-Transactions: Software QA Lead (Nov 2005 - May 2006). Synopsys: Software Engineer (Jul 2001 - Nov 2005) - Developed automatic unit test systems and maintained API for database systems.
project_history: Developed and deployed machine learning models like GNN, CNN, LSTM, and Linear Regression for cyber threat detection. Delivered GenAI/LLM-based products using GPT API as cybersecurity product differentiators. Managed the build of Data Science/Analysis infrastructure in Microsoft Azure including ADLS Gen2, Databricks, Synapse, Azure Machine Learning Studio, and PowerBI Pro.
skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Cybersecurity, GenAI, Stakeholder Relations, Software Development Methodologies, Microsoft Azure, Kafka, Kubernetes, Argo CD, Docker, ClickHouse, Perl, C-Shell, TCL/TK, Python.
education: Stanford University: Artifical Intelligence Graduate Certificate (2018 - 2021). Shanghai Normal University: Bachelor in Calculation Mathematics and Its Applied Software (1997 - 2001).
